body_html:
After testing this more thoroughly with just calls to CUDA runtime APIs, we cannot confirm that the pinned memory allocator is causing this problem. I'm closing this issue until (and if) we can confirm that pinned memory is causing our issues.

Thanks!

body:
After testing this more thoroughly with just calls to CUDA runtime APIs, we cannot confirm that the pinned memory allocator is causing this problem. I'm closing this issue until (and if) we can confirm that pinned memory is causing our issues.

Thanks!
